item.description:
October's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: The Writing ABC: Revising

For the rest of the year, we will discuss the writing basics. This month we will talk about deciding which words remain on the page. This topic is so vast, we'll probably generate enough questions to keep us talking all day.

Agenda:

4:00 Names. What's the hardest thing about revising?
Topic: Revising

October Challenge: (TBD)
Writing Prompt: (TBD)

5:00 Break
Book / Magazine Offerings
Open Discussions

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers October Meetup
